name: Banana Split Personal Laptop (Bananaware ProPad)
description: A student favorite. Cheap to buy; impossible to keep repaired.

name: Civiclink Authority (Vertex Glidebook S1)
description: An ultra portable, high-performance laptop favored by professionals. Surprisingly sturdy.

name: Antiqua Tablet — Old World Model T-1
description: A wizard's tome disguised as a tablet computer. Its archaic OS is a haven for dormant spirits.

name: Vertex Systems ArcSlate Pro — A-3 Pro Tablet
description: Intended for graphic designers and artists, this high-end tablet is best used with a stylus and specialized software.

name: Mechane Sunvault Mobile Workstation — Mechane Type-X Brain Box
description: An ancient laptop that has stubbornly refused to die. Favored by specialists who work in the field.
